item.title: By: Rebekah
item.dc:creator: Rebekah
item.description: I just made these, they were delicious! But they kept falling apart in my hand. I think next time I just need to roll them a little tighter. We ate them very quickly!
item.content:encoded: I just made these, they were delicious! But they kept falling apart in my hand. I think next time I just need to roll them a little tighter. We ate them very quickly!

item.title: By: Amy @ cookbookmaniac.com
item.dc:creator: Amy @ cookbookmaniac.com
item.description: I would be the greedy fool sitting next to a plate of these and not sharing any of them : ) best keep them away from me please! they looks so yummy!
item.content:encoded: I would be the greedy fool sitting next to a plate of these and not sharing any of them : ) best keep them away from me please! they looks so yummy!

item.title: By: Karen (missklicious)

item.description: These look so moreish! I've had something similar at a work morning tea, and they were gone in a flash.

item.title: By: Jeanne
item.dc:creator: Jeanne
item.description: These do sound addictive! I love the colors that you used in this version! Puff pastry sounds like a delicious pizza crust.
item.content:encoded: These do sound addictive! I love the colors that you used in this version! Puff pastry sounds like a delicious pizza crust.

item.title: By: Laetitia
item.dc:creator: Laetitia
item.description: quick and delicious! it's the first time I see this way to cook mini pizzas... it's great!
item.content:encoded: quick and delicious! it’s the first time I see this way to cook mini pizzas… it’s great!

item.title: By: Barbara
item.dc:creator: Barbara
item.description: Now those are so clever, Anita! I've had such fun using puff pastry...from sticky buns to savory appetizers. Now pizza is one thing I wouldn't have thought of. (and I have an extra sheet in the freezer right now!) A fun treat and you could put anything on it you liked on your regular pizza!
item.content:encoded: Now those are so clever, Anita! I’ve had such fun using puff pastry…from sticky buns to savory appetizers. Now pizza is one thing I wouldn’t have thought of. (and I have an extra sheet in the freezer right now!) A fun treat and you could put anything on it you liked on your regular pizza!

item.title: By: Simon @ the heart of food
item.dc:creator: Simon @ the heart of food
item.description:
These look so moreish!
Are there any issues with just the cheese holding eveything together? Have you ever found the bottoms falling out?
item.content:encoded:
